titles.title: A bill to designate a mountain in the State of Alaska as Denali.
A bill to designate a mountain in the State of Alaska as Denali.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 113-27.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Wyden without amendment. With written report No. 113-93.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 171.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates a specified mountain in Alaska as "Denali."
